data.title: Freight Fest 2023
data.text:
FREIGHT FEST is back! Join us for another FREE all-day, block party-style music festival on Saturday, October 14, 10:30 AM – 6:00 PM. We’ll have three stages of live music (on Addison Street and inside our venue), food trucks, and family-friendly activities. Mark your calendars!

SHATTUCK STAGE

10:30 AM OctoPretzel

1:00 PM Orchestra Gold

3:15 PM QUITAPENAS

MILVIA STAGE

11:45 AM Alphabet Rockers

2:00 PM Anthony Paule Soul Orchestra

4:45 PM Lyrics Born

UPSTAIRS CLASSROOM 210

(Inside The Freight)

1:00 PM Hip-Hop Cypher w/ Najee Amaranth and Amani Jade

LITTLE VILLAGE STAGE

(Inside The Freight)

2:00 PM The Sampaguitas

2:30 PM Alabama Mike and Kid Andersen

3:00 PM Nic Clark

3:30 PM Maurice Tani

4:00 PM Aki Kumar

4:30 PM Marina Crouse

5:00 PM The Sons of The Soul Revivers

EAT & DRINK

BEER, WINE & SNACKS:

Available inside The Freight

Beer tent on Addison Street

Main sponsor is Triple Rock (pouring 2 beers).

Guest appearance by Jupiter pouring Quasar.

FOOD TRUCKS:

La Parrillada Feliz Mexican Food

Cousins Maine Lobster

FARMERS’ MARKET:

Center st. Between Milvia & MLK. 10am – 3pm

IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD:

Dozens of downtown restaurants just a walk away.
